subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Carson Palmer threw two touchdown passes and Michael Bush ran 30 times for a season-high 157 yards and one touchdown to lead the Raiders to a 24-17 win over San Diego on Thursday.
snippet: Carson Palmer threw two touchdown passes and Michael Bush ran 30 times for a season-high 157 yards and one touchdown to lead the Raiders to a 24-17 win over San Diego on Thursday.
